verses.text: \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \add covenant\add* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w ordinances|strong="G1345"\w* of divine \w service|strong="G2999"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w a|strong="G0039"\w* \w worldly|strong="G2886"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="G0039"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w was|strong="G2680"\w* a \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w* \w made|strong="G2680"\w*; the \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add was\add* the \w candlestick|strong="G3087"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w table|strong="G5132"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w shewbread|strong="G4286"\w*; \w which|strong="G3748"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="G0039"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2665"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w veil|strong="G2665"\w*, the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w* which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Holiest|strong="G0039"\w* of \w all|strong="G0039"\w*;

Which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G2369"\w* \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w censer|strong="G2369"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w ark|strong="G2787"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w overlaid|strong="G4028"\w* round \w about|strong="G3840"\w* with \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add was\add* \w the|strong="G4713"\w* \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w pot|strong="G4713"\w* that \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w manna|strong="G3131"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aaronâ€™s|strong="G0002"\w* \w rod|strong="G4464"\w* that \w budded|strong="G0985"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w tables|strong="G4109"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w over|strong="G5231"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* the \w cherubims|strong="G5502"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w shadowing|strong="G2683"\w* the \w mercyseat|strong="G2435"\w*; \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we \w can|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w particularly|strong="G3313"\w*.

Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* \w were|strong="G2680"\w* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* \w ordained|strong="G2680"\w*, the \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* \w went|strong="G1524"\w* \w always|strong="G1275"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G4633"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*, \w accomplishing|strong="G2005"\w* the \w service|strong="G2999"\w* \add of God\add*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \add went\add* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w alone|strong="G3441"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* every \w year|strong="G1763"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add for\add* the \w errors|strong="G0051"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*:

\w The|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w signifying|strong="G1213"\w*, that the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* into the holiest of \w all|strong="G0039"\w* \w was|strong="G5319"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3380"\w* made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w*, while \w as|strong="G2089"\w* \w the|strong="G4633"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w* \w was|strong="G2192"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w standing|strong="G4714"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3748"\w* \add was\add* a \w figure|strong="G3850"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* then \w present|strong="G1764"\w*, \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* were \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*, \w that|strong="G3361"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w make|strong="G5048"\w* him that did the \w service|strong="G3000"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*, as pertaining \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*;

\add Which stood\add* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w meats|strong="G1033"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drinks|strong="G4188"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w divers|strong="G1313"\w* \w washings|strong="G0909"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4561"\w* \w ordinances|strong="G1345"\w*, \w imposed|strong="G1945"\w* \add on them\add* \w until|strong="G3360"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* of \w reformation|strong="G1357"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* being \w come|strong="G3854"\w* an high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* of good \w things|strong="G0018"\w* to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w a|strong="G4633"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* more \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* made with \w hands|strong="G5499"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* is to \w say|strong="G2076"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G2937"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w building|strong="G2937"\w*;

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w goats|strong="G5131"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w calves|strong="G3448"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* he entered \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w once|strong="G2178"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the holy \w place|strong="G0039"\w*, having \w obtained|strong="G2147"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w redemption|strong="G3085"\w* \add for us\add*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w bulls|strong="G5022"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w goats|strong="G5131"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w ashes|strong="G4700"\w* of an \w heifer|strong="G1151"\w* \w sprinkling|strong="G4472"\w* the \w unclean|strong="G2840"\w*, \w sanctifieth|strong="G0037"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w purifying|strong="G2514"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*:

How \w much|strong="G4214"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w shall|strong="G2511"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* without \w spot|strong="G0299"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w purge|strong="G2511"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w the|strong="G2316"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5124"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* of \w the|strong="G1242"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w testament|strong="G1242"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* by \w means|strong="G1096"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* of the \w transgressions|strong="G3847"\w* \add that were\add* \w under|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1242"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w testament|strong="G1242"\w*, \w they|strong="G2983"\w* which are \w called|strong="G2564"\w* might \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w of|strong="G2817"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* a \w testament|strong="G1242"\w* \add is\add*, there must also of necessity be the \w death|strong="G2288"\w* of the \w testator|strong="G1303"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* a \w testament|strong="G1242"\w* \add is\add* of \w force|strong="G0949"\w* \w after|strong="G1909"\w* men are \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*: \w otherwise|strong="G1893"\w* it is \w of|strong="G2480"\w* \w no|strong="G3379"\w* \w strength|strong="G2480"\w* at \w all|strong="G3379"\w* \w while|strong="G3753"\w* the \w testator|strong="G1303"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w Whereupon|strong="G3606"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \add testament\add* was \w dedicated|strong="G1457"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G2980"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* had \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w precept|strong="G1785"\w* \w to|strong="G2992"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w calves|strong="G3448"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w goats|strong="G5131"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scarlet|strong="G2847"\w* \w wool|strong="G2053"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hyssop|strong="G5301"\w*, and \w sprinkled|strong="G4472"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of the \w testament|strong="G1242"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w enjoined|strong="G1781"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G3668"\w* he \w sprinkled|strong="G4472"\w* with \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w vessels|strong="G4632"\w* of the \w ministry|strong="G3009"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w almost|strong="G4975"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G2511"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w purged|strong="G2511"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* shedding of \w blood|strong="G0130"\w* \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w remission|strong="G0859"\w*.

\add It was\add* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* necessary \w that|strong="G0318"\w* the \w patterns|strong="G5262"\w* of \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* should be \w purified|strong="G2511"\w* with \w these|strong="G5125"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the heavenly \w things|strong="G2032"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G2378"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the holy \w places|strong="G0039"\w* made with \w hands|strong="G5499"\w*, \add which are\add* the \w figures|strong="G0499"\w* of the \w true|strong="G0228"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w itself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* to \w appear|strong="G1718"\w* in the \w presence|strong="G4383"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*:

Nor \w yet|strong="G3761"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w entereth|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the holy \w place|strong="G0039"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w others|strong="G0245"\w*;

For \w then|strong="G1893"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w* have \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2602"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w end|strong="G4930"\w* of the \w world|strong="G0165"\w* hath he \w appeared|strong="G5319"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* put \w away|strong="G0115"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* of \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* it is \w appointed|strong="G0606"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* to \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* the \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*:

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w was|strong="G4374"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bear|strong="G0399"\w* the \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w*; and unto them that look \w for|strong="G0553"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* shall he \w appear|strong="G3700"\w* the second \w time|strong="G1208"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.
